title: Tears of the Kingdom Rewrites Zelda's Closure Formula | Good Blood
description:
Join our Patreon for a week of Early Access to all of our Premium video series including Zero Punctuation, Cold Take, Extra Punctuation, Adventure is Nigh and more! Just $2/month with a 7 day free trial. ►► https://www.patreon.com/the_escapist

In this new essay by Good Blood, we explore how Tears Of The Kingdom changed an age-old formula when it comes to how Zelda games end. Obviously spoilers ahead.
